meanings.definition: An infection of the intestines caused by the amoeba Entamoeba histolytica.
meanings.sent1: Amoebiasis can make your stomach hurt a lot.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with amoebiasis after running tests.
meanings.sent3: The party was ruined when an unexpected guest called Amoebiasis showed up.
meanings.sent4: Amoebiasis crept into the community, spreading silently like a shadow.
meanings.sent5: The severity of amoebiasis can vary from person to person.

meanings.definition: The presence of amoebas in the body, especially in the intestines, causing symptoms such as diarrhea and abdominal pain.
meanings.sent1: She experienced amoebiasis symptoms after drinking contaminated water.
meanings.sent2: Amoebiasis is a common health issue in tropical regions.
meanings.sent3: The pet store had to close temporarily due to an outbreak of amoebiasis among the fish.
meanings.sent4: Amoebiasis spread through the school like wildfire, affecting many students.
meanings.sent5: The doctor recommended specific medication to treat the patient's severe amoebiasis.
